data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Ball safe as San Luis is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 6, Rafael Carioca (Tigres) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by San Luis defenders.
Throw-in Tigres.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a throw-in for Tigres, close to San Luis's area.
In the minute 7, Can Tigres capitalize from this throw-in deep inside San Luis's half?
In Nuevo Leon Tigres attack through Leonardo Fernandez. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Nuevo Leon.
In the minute 9, Andre Pierre Gignac of Tigres smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Throw-in for San Luis in the half of Tigres.
San Luis's Enrique Lopez breaks free at Estadio Universitario (UANL). But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 10, Goal kick for Tigres at Estadio Universitario (UANL).
Can Tigres get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in San Luis's half?
Fernando Hernandez Gomez awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 12, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for San Luis in their own half.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a Tigres throw-in in San Luis's half.
In the minute 15, Fernando Hernandez Gomez awards San Luis a goal kick.
In Nuevo Leon a free kick has been awarded the away team.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Tigres close to the penalty box.
In the minute 19, Tigres have been awarded a corner by Fernando Hernandez Gomez.
Tigres are pushing forward but Andre Pierre Gignac's finish is wide of the goal.
San Luis have a goal kick.
In the minute 20, San Luis to take a throw-in in Tigres territory.
Ball goes out of play for a Tigres goal kick.
Tigres have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 25, Throw-in for Tigres close to the penalty box.
Corner awarded to Tigres.
Tigres's Javier Aquino gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 26, San Luis have a goal kick.
Juan Castro for San Luis gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Tigres goal kick.
In the minute 28, Throw-in for Tigres at Estadio Universitario (UANL).
Andre Pierre Gignac for Tigres gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez awards San Luis a goal kick.
In the minute 30, San Luis awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in Tigres.
Free kick San Luis.
In the minute 32, Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a Tigres throw-in in San Luis's half.
Goal kick for San Luis at Estadio Universitario (UANL).
Tigres to take a throw-in in San Luis territory.
In the minute 34, Free kick for Tigres in the half of San Luis.
Throw-in for San Luis in their own half.
Can Tigres get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in San Luis's half?
In the minute 36, San Luis needs to be cautious. Tigres have an attacking throw-in.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Nuevo Leon.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez awards San Luis a goal kick.
In the minute 40, Throw-in for Tigres at Estadio Universitario (UANL).
Carlos Salcedo is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Carlos Salcedo is back on the pitch.
In the minute 43, Throw-in for Tigres in the half of San Luis.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez awards the away team a throw-in.
Carlos Salcedo (Tigres) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Diego Reyes.
In the minute 45, Tigres pushes forward through Andre Pierre Gignac, whose finish on goal is saved.
San Luis awarded a throw-in in their own half.
The fourth official's board shows 1 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Tigres.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez blows to end the first-half.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Free kick for San Luis in the half of Tigres.
San Luis surge into the attack at Estadio Universitario (UANL) but Ventura Alvaradoâ€™s header is off-target.
Tigres have a goal kick.
In the minute 48, Free kick San Luis.
In Nuevo Leon a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez waits before resuming play because Rodrigo Noya for San Luis is still down.
In the minute 52, Rodrigo Noya is back on his feet again.
Ball safe as San Luis is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Tigres in their own half.
In the minute 54, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to Tigres.
Tigres have been awarded a corner by Fernando Hernandez Gomez.
In the minute 56, Tigres to take a throw-in in San Luis territory.
San Luis awarded a free kick in their own half.
Leonardo Fernandez (Tigres) has received a yellow card from Fernando Hernandez Gomez.
In the minute 57, At Estadio Universitario (UANL), Diego Pineda has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Throw-in high up the field for San Luis in Nuevo Leon.
Tigres's Leonardo Fernandez misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 61, Goal kick for San Luis at Estadio Universitario (UANL).
Tigres's Julian Quinones scores with his head to give his side a 1-0 lead.
Javier Aquino instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 63, The home team have replaced Julian Quinones with Eduardo Vargas. This is the second substitution made today by Ricardo Ferretti.
Ricardo Ferretti is making the team's third substitution at Estadio Universitario (UANL) with Nicolas Lopez replacing Leonardo Fernandez.
Free kick for San Luis in their own half.
In the minute 65, Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Tigres.
Matias Catalan (San Luis) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Free kick Tigres.
In the minute 70, The ref points to the spot, it's a penalty for Tigres.
Andre Pierre Gignac smashes in a penalty at Estadio Universitario (UANL). The score is now 2-0.
Renato Mendoza is replacing Enrique Lopez for the away team.
In the minute 73, Tigres awarded a free kick in their own half.
San Luis's Diego Pineda has been shown a second yellow card and sent off.
Tigres are coming forward and Andre Pierre Gignac gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 75, It's a goal kick for the away team in Nuevo Leon.
In Nuevo Leon a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Guido Pizarro of Tigres gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 77, Ball goes out of play for a San Luis goal kick.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Tigres in their own half.
San Luis make their first substitution with Ricardo Gibran Garcia replacing Juan Castro.
In the minute 80, San Luis have been awarded a corner by Fernando Hernandez Gomez.
Ventura Alvarado (San Luis) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a Tigres throw-in in San Luis's half.
In the minute 81, Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to San Luis.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez awards the home team a throw-in.
Tigres are on the attack at Estadio Universitario (UANL), where Javier Aquino is presented with a great scoring opportunity. But the ball hits the upright!
In the minute 83, Fernando Hernandez Gomez awards San Luis a goal kick.
In Nuevo Leon San Luis drive forward through Renato Mendoza. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Throw-in for San Luis in their own half.
In the minute 89, Free kick for Tigres in the half of San Luis.
San Luis will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Tigres.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Nuevo Leon.
Tigres's Andre Pierre Gignac gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Nuevo Leon.
Can Tigres get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in San Luis's half?
Fernando Hernandez Gomez blows to end the match. The final score is 3-0.
Andre Pierre Gignac for Tigres has been booked by Fernando Hernandez Gomez and receives a first yellow card.
San Luis's Jorge Sanchez has been booked in Nuevo Leon.
Goal! Eduardo Vargas extends Tigres's lead to 3-0.
